00106 /* /////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00107  * Action Shims
00108  */
00109 
00110 #ifndef STLSOFT_AUTO_BUFFER_NEW_FORM
00111 # error This is only compatible with stlsoft::auto_buffer in new mode
00112 #endif /* !STLSOFT_AUTO_BUFFER_NEW_FORM */
00113 
00132 #ifndef FASTFORMAT_AUTO_BUFFER_SINK_ONLY_SIMPLE_FORM_SUPPORT
00133 template <typename C, size_t N, typename A>
00134 inline stlsoft::auto_buffer<C, N, A>& fmt_slices(
00135     stlsoft::auto_buffer<C, N, A>&      sink
00136 #else /* ? !FASTFORMAT_AUTO_BUFFER_SINK_ONLY_SIMPLE_FORM_SUPPORT */
00137 inline stlsoft::auto_buffer<ff_char_t>& fmt_slices(
00138     stlsoft::auto_buffer<ff_char_t>&    sink
00139 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_AUTO_BUFFER_SINK_ONLY_SIMPLE_FORM_SUPPORT */
00140 ,   int                                 flags
00141 ,   size_t                              cchTotal
00142 ,   size_t                              numResults
00143 ,   ff_string_slice_t const*            results
00144 )
00145 {
00146 #ifndef FASTFORMAT_AUTO_BUFFER_SINK_ONLY_SIMPLE_FORM_SUPPORT
00147     typedef C           char_t;
00148 #else /* ? !FASTFORMAT_AUTO_BUFFER_SINK_ONLY_SIMPLE_FORM_SUPPORT */
00149     typedef ff_char_t   char_t;
00150 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_AUTO_BUFFER_SINK_ONLY_SIMPLE_FORM_SUPPORT */
00151 
00152     STLSOFT_STATIC_ASSERT(sizeof(char_t) == sizeof(ff_char_t));
00153 
00154     // There're some complications with the size here:
00155     //
00156     //  - auto_buffer is guaranteed not to discard allocated memory as long
00157     //    as resize(0) is not called
00158     //  - we want strong exception semantics
00159     //
00160     // Consequently we ask for the maximum possible size, which is
00161     //  <current-size> + cchTotal + 1 (for '\0') + 2 (for CR / LF). We will
00162     // subsequently discard some of this if not needed, without risking
00163     // needing to ask again for more memory later
00164 
00165     const size_t            initialSize = sink.size();
00166 
00167     // do the resize
00168     if(sink.resize(initialSize + cchTotal + 1 + 2)) // Check for alloc failure, even though will never return false when exception-handling support is on
00169     {
00170         size_t currentSize = initialSize;
00171 
00172         // first we check for a current trailing nul character
00173 
00174         if( 0 != currentSize && 
00175             '\0' == sink[currentSize - 1])
00176         {
00177             --currentSize;
00178         }
00179 
00180         // next we concatenate all the slices
00181 
00182         ff_char_t* p = sink.data() + currentSize;
00183 
00184         { for(size_t i = 0; i < numResults; ++i)
00185         {
00186             ff_string_slice_t const& slice = results[i];
00187 
00188             ::memcpy(p, slice.ptr, slice.len * sizeof(char_t));
00189             p += slice.len;
00190         }}
00191 
00192         // then append the new line, if required
00193 
00194         if(flags::ff_newLine & flags)
00195         {
00196             const ff_string_slice_t crlf = fastformat_getNewlineForPlatform();
00197 
00198             ::memcpy(p, crlf.ptr, crlf.len * sizeof(char_t));
00199             p += crlf.len;
00200         }
00201 
00202         // finally we append the terminating nul character
00203 
00204         *p++ = '\0';
00205 
00206         FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_POSTCONDITION_STATE_APPL_LAYER(p <= sink.end(), "auto_buffer sink writing logic failed: write pointer exceeds available space");
00207         FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_POSTCONDITION_STATE_APPL_LAYER(static_cast<size_t>(p - sink.data()) <= sink.size(), "auto_buffer sink writing logic failed: write pointer exceeds available space");
00208         //FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_POSTCONDITION_STATE_APPL_LAYER(static_cast<size_t>(p - sink.data()) == currentSize, "auto_buffer sink writing logic failed: write pointer exceeds available space");
00209         FASTFORMAT_CONTRACT_ENFORCE_POSTCONDITION_STATE_APPL_LAYER(((sink.data() + currentSize) - p) < static_cast<ptrdiff_t>(fastformat_getNewlineForPlatform().len), "auto_buffer sink writing logic failed: write pointer exceeds available space");
00210 
00211         sink.resize(static_cast<size_t>(p - sink.data()));
00212     }
00213 
00214     return sink;
00215 }
00216

00224 #endif /* !FASTFORMAT_NO_NAMESPACE */
